Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-48174 affecting package busybox for versions less than 1.35.0-13
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-48174 affecting package busybox for versions less than 1.35.0-13. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package busybox is earlier than 1.35.0-13, affected by CVE-2022-48174
